name: Sonoma Pharmaceuticals, Inc.
description: Sonoma Pharmaceuticals, Inc. is a global leader in the development and commercialization of innovative healthcare products using its patented Microcyn® Technology. Founded in 1997 and headquartered in Petaluma, California, Sonoma focuses on providing solutions for wound care, dermatology, and eye care. The company's flagship product, Microcyn® Technology, is a safe and effective solution for managing chronic and acute wounds, as well as various skin conditions. Sonoma's products are designed to enhance the healing process by creating an optimal environment for tissue repair while minimizing the risk of infection. With a commitment to research and development, Sonoma continuously seeks to expand its product offerings and improve patient outcomes through advanced technology. The company markets its products through various channels, including healthcare professionals, hospitals, and specialty pharmacies, aiming to address unmet medical needs in the healthcare market. Sonoma Pharmaceuticals is dedicated to enhancing the quality of life for patients and providing healthcare professionals with effective tools to manage complex medical conditions. As the demand for advanced wound care and dermatological solutions increases, Sonoma is poised to leverage its expertise and innovative technology to meet these challenges head-on.
